diagram_logic_form: The length of line $BC$ is $5$ units.
The length of line $AC$ is $8x$ units.
The length of line $BC$ is $110x + 53$ units.
The length of line $AC$ is $73$ units.
The length of line $AB$ is $150x + 91$ units.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$ and $BC$ forming a triangle $ABC$.
